}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== [http://www.asus.com/News/rZcy4jXiQPQ5F8YL/ News] {{â€¢}} [http://www.broadcom.com/press/release.php?id=s637241 Press Release]
*"USB-AC53" and "REV 1.40" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :The device is shown as using two [http://www.skyworksinc.com/Product.aspx?ProductID=1502 '''Skyworks''' SKY85803] FEM's.
Despite being a 2x2:2 device, the speed is limited to about 350Mbps due to USB 2.0 interface limitations.
==See also== *[[ASUS USB-AC53 Nano]] * [[Template:ASUS AC products|ASUS AC products]] * [http://www.asus.com/event/2014/network/ASUS_AC_family_chart/solutions.html Asus Wireless AC networking solutions] * [http://www.asus.com/us/site/routers/DD-WRT/ Asus Routers with DD-WRT firmware support] * [http://event.asus.com/2013/nw/ASUSWRT/index.htm AsusWRT Support List] * [http://www.hub.ru/wiki/Devices_ASUS_WL_Routers Devices ASUS Routers]
